Name: MaticPad
Description: MaticPad is an autonomous cross-chain plug-n-play fundraising platform, enabling innovators to mint tokens, build custom smart contracts, and strategize listing and deployment all from a single dashboard.The $MATPAD token will work as the native utility token for the platform.The $MATPAD token holders will get exclusive access to different platform modules such as the plug-n-play (BUID), rewards sharing, and also the opportunity to participate in the different platform offerings be it private or public.Telegram | Medium
